users.bio: Nikola Jurecka is an HR consultant from Ostrava. In their spare time they are involved in LGBTQI+ activism and collecting historical objects from the coal mining era. Jurečka loves art from the socialist era, but hates communism.
users.name: Nikola
traits: Loves coal mining and social realism.

users.bio: After their studies in Prague, Vlasta Nguyen returned to their native Olomouc, which they try to bring back to life through graphic design and engaged citizenship. They love to run with German Shepherd in the park and to participate in orienteering race. Vlasta actively fights against clientelism of the local cultural scene.
users.name: Vlasta

users.bio: Radko Spývala is a doctor from Pilsen, widely known from the media. Radko often speaks publicly and refutes medical half-truths. Because of Radko's identity and opinions, xhe is a frequent target not only of verbal attacks. Radko is not ashamed of it and, on the contrary, makes all of it public in order to reveal the hidden nature of things.
users.name: Radko
traits: Likes fine art and graphic design.

users.bio: Ivo Mayer is a media theorist from Prague. As a descendant of expelled Sudeten Germans, he returned to the land of his ancestors, something many of his friends warned him against. Now he is discovering the beauty of a small pond of muddy carp and low wages. He is still working on a groundbreaking new book.
users.name: Ivo
traits: Hates when somebody talks about media and is not theoretician.
Ivo loves to preach to people.

users.bio: Petra Crháková is a geoengineer from Ústí nad Labem. She specializes in reclamation. In her free time she is interested in bonsai and Japanese culture. She dreams of moving to Japan, the land of tremors.
users.name: Petra
traits: Hates non-binary people (they are not trans).

users.bio: Marie Benda studies at the Bishop's Gymnasium in Brno, where she fled from her father in Prague. She is interested in biochemistry and manga. She likes cycling in the city and mountains, she is vegan.
users.name: Marie

users.bio: Jana Peslova is a well-known medalist in javelin. She likes movies.
users.name: Jana
traits: Lost her family because of shooting.

users.bio: Božena Demeterová likes her family, peace and order. She likes Prague for its multicultural atmosphere.
users.name: Božena

users.bio: Aneta Janků studies performance at the Faculty of Arts in Ostrava. She focuses mainly on socially critical projects and engaged art with a focus on ecology and human rights. She shoots long guns competitively.
users.name: Aneta

users.bio: Dana Marksová is a Czech architect specializing in ecological family houses. After the loss of her family in a tragic car accident, she has dedicated herself to her foundation supporting victims of car accidents.
users.name: Dana
traits: Supports cycling and ecology where she can.

users.bio: Petr Pivoda is a sales manager in a shop on the outskirts of Prague. In his spare time, he enjoys driving his BMW and playing airsoft. He spends his Friday nights at a prestigious club.
users.name: Petr

users.bio: Tomáš Horváth likes rock and long trips. He fulfils his dream of equality behind the wheel on long trips to western countries. #spaceforcyclists
users.name: Tomáš
traits: Hates racists, ego maniacs and unrespectful car drivers.

users.bio: Elementary school teacher, regular family guy. #bigbeat #right
users.name: Jan

users.bio: Programmer and big fan of open source software. Taxes are theft (alimony is theft), convince me otherwise. #anarchocapitalism
users.name: Pavel
traits: He often comments on social media with the aim of finding a partner.

users.bio: Dominik Beneš is a football fan. He works as a policeman. In his free time he goes with his girlfriend and dog to the beautiful countryside. He's afraid that some Sparta chants will soon be banned. The world as we know it is going to shit. But he hopes the future can still be saved.
users.name: Dominik
traits: Thinks that poor people are trash.

users.bio: Proud owner of a art and car gallery. Green communists off my doorstep! #shooting
users.name: Josef
traits: Loves his grandchildren, but they are green communists.

users.bio: Filip Otmar works as a nurse in a large hospital in Prague. He came to wider attention as the one who threw an egg at the Minister of Finance. In his spare time he enjoys rapping.
users.name: Filip
traits: Hates right wing politics which cuts his incomes.

users.bio: Husband and father of three. Family comes first. And then photography.
users.name: Alois
traits: Very much dislikes conservatives and right-wingers.
As a Roma, he has had negative experiences with racism.

users.bio: Retired teacher. Cats and grandkids are everything.
users.name: Helena
traits: She comments all over the place.
Often comments about her family and dogs, completely offtopic.

users.bio: Your request has been refused! #critical #thinking
users.name: Ivana
traits: She sees a conspiracy behind everything.

users.bio: A doctor who can't help but twist the steering wheel.
users.name: Olena
